title: E-cigarettes: Harm reduction or ‘gateway’ to new smokers?

title_detail.value: E-cigarettes: Harm reduction or ‘gateway’ to new smokers?

summary: Smoking is an issue that has been at the heart of public health concerns for decades, with many efforts to restrict tobacco sales, tax cigarettes and sometimes hard-hitting campaigns to get people to quit smoking. But if the tobacco control community has long agreed on the harms of smoking, the place of reducing, rather than eliminating, harm has been hotly contested.
